titleInfo.title: RAPTOR – A Scalable Platform for Rapid Prototyping and FPGA-based Cluster Computing
Parallel Computing: From Multicores and GPU's to Petascale, Advances in Parallel Computing

bibliographicCitation.wels: Porrmann, M.; Hagemeyer, J.; Pohl, C.; Romoth, J.; Strugholtz, M. (2010): RAPTOR – A Scalable Platform for Rapid Prototyping and FPGA-based Cluster Computing.
